item.description:
Join us for a fun night playing board games, having some drinks, enjoying complimentary appetizers and socializing! We will have space reserved for us at the Mass Ave. Tavern. The Tavern has board game nights every Tuesday and has a collection of board games available for guests to play. I will bring games too. Feel free to bring your favorite board or card games with you. This will be a great night, so be sure to join us! Each guest is responsible for the cost of their own food/drink.

Important Note: It is important that we have an accurate headcount, so only sign up if you can definitely attend. If your plans change, be sure to update your RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) at our tables. Please call/text Catherine at 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Board Game Night at Mass Ave Tavern: Comp Apps
